column1: #text=On the weekend I planted an apple an apple tree .
#text=first , I put on gardening gloves to protect my hands .
#text=Next , I used a small shovel to dig a hole in a patch of dirt in my backyard .
#text=I then took an apple seed and placed it inside the hole .
#text=Next , I took the soil that I had dug out earlier and placed it on top of the seed , creating a thin layer of soil on top of the seed .
#text=I then took my watering can over to the water hose and used the hose to fill the can up with water .

#text=When the can was full , I brought it back over to the patch of dirt where the apple seed was planted , and I gently poured the water from the watering can onto the patch of dirt , watering my newly-planted apple seed .
#text=I thought happily about how exciting it will be when my tiny apple seed grows into a huge apple tree .
